title: An Island Hideout:  Episode 45
itunes:subtitle: From the sunshine of Antigua to the windswept south coast of the Isle of Wight, this week we examine a drug smuggling plot involving love, greed and adventure.  In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we look at how a plan to smuggle cocain...
content:encoded:
From the sunshine of Antigua to the windswept south coast of the Isle of Wight, this week we examine a drug smuggling plot involving love, greed and adventure. In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we look at how a plan to smuggle cocaine was hatched and the outcomes for all the key players involved.
